metadata.title: TaylorMade
metadata.description: We are introducing the new P790 irons to mid-handicap golfers wanting a quality improvement iron
metadata.author: Pablo

document_info.title: Strategic Marketing Brief: TaylorMade Golf's Summer Tour Madness

executive_summary.challenge: TaylorMade Golf faces the challenge of increasing adoption of its new p790 irons among mid-handicap golfers in a highly competitive market.
executive_summary.opportunity: The introduction of the p790 irons presents a significant opportunity to capture market share by appealing to mid-handicap golfers seeking game improvement features.
executive_summary.strategy: Leverage targeted digital marketing campaigns across Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube to engage mid-handicap golfers, highlighting the unique game improvement features of the p790 irons.
executive_summary.expected_outcome: Achieve a 20% increase in conversions for the p790 irons within the 3-month campaign period.

roi_projections.ltv_increase: 20% with supporting rationale of increased brand loyalty

business_impact_metrics.market_positioning_shift: Improved by 3 points with competitive analysis

executive_recommendations: Invest in influencer partnerships on Instagram and TikTok to amplify reach and engagement.
Implement a robust A/B testing strategy to optimize creative assets and messaging.
Monitor competitor activities closely and adjust strategies to mitigate potential threats.

business_context.company_overview: TaylorMade Golf is a leading brand in the golf equipment industry, known for innovation and quality.
business_context.market_position: TaylorMade holds a strong position in the premium golf equipment market, competing with brands like Callaway and Titleist.
business_objectives: Increase market share among mid-handicap golfers by 5% within the next year.
Enhance brand perception as the go-to choice for game improvement irons.
strategic_initiatives: Launch targeted digital campaigns to increase product awareness.
Develop partnerships with golf influencers to enhance brand credibility.
business_context.market_conditions: The golf equipment market is mature, with steady demand driven by innovation and brand loyalty.
industry_trends: Growing interest in game improvement technologies among amateur golfers.
Increased use of digital platforms for product research and purchase.

market_analysis.market_growth_rate: 2% annually, driven by technological advancements and increased participation in golf.

market_segmentation.characteristics: Seeking game improvement features and brand reliability.

market_analysis.market_dynamics: Competitive landscape with a focus on innovation and brand differentiation.
